column4: Can anyone help me with the best program to convert full dvds into like 1gb XVID movies?
hey WindsofTime, get the .deb from uhh  http://getdeb.net
pidgin is a biotch to compile because you need really special SSL to use MSN or Gmail
its not that bad, you just need to install a couple extra packages. Vive is a bi*** to compile, I couldn't even get it to work.
